hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition via Breakout with Sector Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market is NEUTRAL and BTC breaks above its 50-day moving average on volume > 1.5x 20-day average, accompanied by simultaneous breakouts in at least 3 of 5 major crypto sectors (DeFi, L1s, L2s, Memes, AI), a long position will profit from the impending transition to a BULL regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Isolated breakouts can fail, but broad-based sector participation indicates genuine capital rotation and increasing risk appetite. This multi-asset confirmation significantly increases the probability of a sustained regime shift from NEUTRAL to BULL.
entry_conditions: ≥3 of 5 major crypto sector indices (e.g., DEFI, L1, L2, MEME, AI) also close above their respective 50-day MAs on the same day

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BULL (take profit on confirmation)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 20 trading days if no regime transition occurs

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Majority of signals (>60%) result in a time exit (no regime transition) or a stop-loss, indicating false breakouts.
